REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2015 reute r f BC-NWA-<NWA>-AIRLINE-ADD 04-13 0045

TEXT.TITLE: NWA <NWA> AIRLINE ADDS TRANSPACIFIC FLIGHT
TEXT.BODY: NWA Inc said its Northwest Airlines unit will add a nonstop Detroit to Tokyo flight April 17. The new flight will operate three times a week until June one, when it will fly seven days a week. Reuter
